spells.name: Nullification Spell
spells.incantation: アインアインソフ アインソフオウル ルーナラーナ
spells.effect: Temporarily nullifies other spells or magic directed towards the target.

spells.name: Explosion Spell
spells.effect: Generates a powerful explosion of energy at the point of impact.

spells.name: Energy Serpent Spell
spells.effect: Creates an energy serpent that attacks enemies.

spells.name: Magical Barrier Spell
spells.incantation: フォーレンムーグローナ
spells.effect: Generates a magical barrier that protects against attacks.

spells.name: Clothing Transformation Spell
spells.incantation: アモルフィエ ヴェステッセ
spells.effect: Transforms the user's clothing into another outfit.

spells.name: Pappiliodya Spell
spells.effect: Summons a swarm of butterflies that confuse the enemy.

spells.name: Wand-Weapon Fusion Spell
spells.incantation: アーム・アーム・アーム
spells.effect: Fuses the wand with a weapon to enhance its power.

spells.name: Dragon Summoning Spell
spells.effect: Summons a dragon of energy to attack enemies.
spells.episode: Luna Nova and the White Dragon

spells.name: Fire Barrier Spell
spells.effect: Creates a fire barrier that protects against attacks.

spells.name: Plant Control Spell
spells.incantation: プランツ・コントロール
spells.effect: Controls the growth and movement of plants.

spells.name: Spirit Summoning Spell
spells.effect: Summons a spirit to assist the user.
spells.episode: Luna Nova and the White Dragon

spells.name: Object Transformation Spell
spells.effect: Transforms an object into another one.

spells.name: Time Control Spell
spells.incantation: タイム・コントロール
spells.effect: Allows the user to slow down or speed up time.

spells.name: Monster Summoning Spell
spells.effect: Summons a monster to fight for the user.

spells.name: Teleportation Spell
spells.effect: Allows the user to teleport to another location.

spells.name: Gravity Control Spell
spells.incantation: グラビティ・コントロール
spells.effect: Allows the user to manipulate gravity in their surroundings.
spells.episode: Luna Nova and the White Dragon
